package step2;

/********* Begin *********/
//定义站台类，实现卖票的功能。
public class Station extends Thread{	
   
    static int number = 20;
    static Object ob="aa";
   
	public void run(){
        super.run();
        while(number > 0){
			synchronized (ob) {
				if(number > 0){
					System.out.println("卖出了第"+number+"张票");
				}else{
					System.out.println("票卖完了");
				}
                number --;
			}
			try {
				sleep(10);
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {
				// TODO Auto-generated catch block
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
       
    }
}
/********* End *********/
